      • doMutation

        public void doMutation()
        Performs tree and node mutation by iterating over the tree. Either tree mutation or node mutation is performed depending on 'nodeMutation'.
        Specified by:
        doMutation in class Chromosome

      • doCrossover

        public void doCrossover(Chromosome father)
        Performs crossover by selecting a random node in each of the two parent trees and swapping the subtrees. If the result types of the two nodes do not match, the mother index (node) is fixed, and the father index is increased in order to find a matching subtree. If the father tree contains no matching node, the crossover does not take place. Note that we only check father indices greater than the random father node (we could also make the search complete by searching all tree nodes).
        Specified by:
        doCrossover in class Chromosome
        Parameters:
        father - the father chromosome

      • mixSoup

        public void mixSoup()
        Creates a random program tree in different manners. FULL always creates trees with the given 'lengt' (=depth), GROW may stop growing at any level with a probability of 0.5, and RAMPED is in the spirit of the original GP ramp, but is here a probabilistic ramping, so trees of any size may be generated. The limit size for all trees is 'length' (=depth).
        Specified by:
        mixSoup in class Chromosome

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of the program tree.
        Specified by:
        toString in class Chromosome
        Returns:
        the tree in string form

      • fromString

        public void fromString(java.lang.String b)
        Creates a program tree from its string representation. Does nothing here, as in the case of GP the program tree is not created from its string representation, but from the XML element 'Tree'. However, the string representation is still saved with the XML element 'Bases'.
        Specified by:
        fromString in class Chromosome
        Parameters:
        b - the program tree in string form
